ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampblade’s in for the fight of her life… instead of facing more mindless monsters, an all-new super deadly sword wielding foe crosses blades with Katie. Who or what is Mom Spaceknight, and why is she unleashing cosmic hell on our cosplaying slayer?!?
Features “artist”, “90s Monster” and risqué variant covers.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Joe Pekar | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Joe Pekar | 4 | E | 90s Monster Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Mangum | 5 | F | 90's Monster Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Mangum | 6 | G | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive "Zombi-Con" Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Dan Mendoza | 7 | H | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive "Zombi-Con" Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 8 |
